TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParamArrayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParamArrayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParamArrayAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示方法在其调用中将允许数目可变的参数。

span.span: Indicates that a method will allow a variable number of arguments in its invocation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示方法参数是参数数组。The indicates that a method parameter is a parameter array. 参数数组允许未知数量的自变量的规范。A parameter array allows the specification of an unknown number of arguments. 参数数组必须是形参列表中中的最后一个参数，并且它必须是一维数组。A parameter array must be the last parameter in a formal parameter list, and it must be a single-dimension array. 当调用该方法时，允许参数数组对应于方法，以在两种方式之一中指定的自变量：When the method is called, a parameter array permits arguments to a method to be specified in either of two ways: - 作为一种隐式转换为参数数组类型的单个表达式。As a single expression of a type that is implicitly convertible to the parameter array type. 作为值参数的函数参数数组。The parameter array functions as a value parameter. - 作为零个或多个参数，其中每个参数都是隐式转换为参数数组元素的类型的类型的表达式。As zero or more arguments, where each argument is an expression of a type that is implictly convertible to the type of the parameter array element. 下一节中的示例阐释了这两个调用约定。The example in the next section illustrates both calling conventions. > [!NOTE] > 通常情况下，不在代码中直接使用。Typically, the is not used directly in code. 相反，各个语言关键字，如`ParamArray`在 Visual Basic 中和`params`在 C# 中，用作包装为类。Instead, individual language keywords, such as `ParamArray` in Visual Basic and `params` in C#, are used as wrappers for the class. 某些语言中的，如 C# 中，甚至可能需要使用该语言关键字和禁止使用。Some languages, such as C#, may even require the use of the language keyword and prohibit the use of . 在重载解析过程支持参数数组的编译器遇到不存在，但具有比的重载，包括参数数组，一个更少的参数的方法重载时它们将方法替换包括的重载参数数组。During overload resolution, when compilers that support parameter arrays encounter a method overload that does not exist but has one fewer parameter than an overload that includes a parameter array, they will replace the method with the overload that includes the parameter array. 例如，调用`String.Split()`实例方法 (其中中不存在类) 解析为对的调用方法。For example, a call to the `String.Split()` instance method (which does not exist in the class) is resolved as a call to the method. 编译器还会将所需的类型的空数组传递给方法。The compiler will also pass an empty array of the required type to the method. 这意味着，该方法必须始终准备好处理在处理参数数组中的元素时，其长度为零的数组。This means that the method must always be prepared to handle an array whose length is zero when it processes the elements in the parameter array. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Temperature`类，包含`Display`方法，其目的是显示一个或多个格式化的温度值。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that includes a `Display` method, which is intended to display one or more formatted temperature values. 该方法只有一个参数， `formats`，其定义为参数数组。The method has a single parameter, `formats`, which is defined as a parameter array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#1)] 下面的示例演示对三个不同调用`Temperature.Display`方法。The following example illustrates three different calls to the `Temperature.Display` method. 在第一个，该方法传递一个格式字符串数组。In the first, the method is passed an array of format strings. 在第二个，该方法传递四个单独的格式字符串作为自变量。In the second, the method is passed four individual format strings as arguments. 在第三个、 不带任何参数调用方法。In the third, the method is called with no arguments. 如示例输出所示，则 Visual Basic 和 C# 编译器将此转换调用`Display`与非空字符串数组的方法。As the output from the example illustrates, the Visual Basic and C# compilers translate this into a call to the `Display` method with an empty string array. [!code-csharp[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/cs/Example.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ParamArrayAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ParamArrayAttribute/vb/Example.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用默认属性初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default properties.
